summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Sections 4, 5, 6 and 10 of Ordinance 110055 (C.L.I.D. No. 4 ) to change annual bond maturity dates, authorizing the Comptroller to set the date of bond sale, eliminate superfluous insurance language; adding a new section creating a special escrow fund for bond redemption and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund; and declaring the emergency therefor.
